name: Friday Night Funkin' Fanworks
description:
Want to play more maps that have a higher difficulty than the main game?

Extra content:

-A lot of new maps for well known and fast-paced songs.
-An additional difficulty setting (Insane)
-Gameplay modifiers inspired by other rythm games (down-scroll, speed change, bot, etc)
-Keyboard configuration

Keep in mind this is a pre-release version, the next update will bring a bit more features to make the project complete.

Enjoy!
